nodes.text: Blood hunts were rituals among the Cathar species of the planet Cathar. During the ritual, Cathar warriors would engage in single combat against entire nests of Kiltik, in order to gain honor and purge themselves of inner darkness. Sylvar, along with Tott Doneeta, went on a blood hunt in 3986 BBY at the urging of Kharr, although the combat only served to fuel her anger.
